GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.15.90
GSD.description:
USB: gadgetfs: Fix race between mounting and unmounting

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.90 by commit a2e075f40122d8daf587db126c562a67abd69cf9, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit e5d82a7360d124ae1a38c2a5eac92ba49b125191. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: USB: gadgetfs: Fix race between mounting and unmounting
